entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Barrhead 06:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
